testcase.name: create a post
testcase.system-out: * url url ................................................................. passed * def requestBody = read ('classpath:karate/request/requestBodyCreatePost.json') . passed * def responsePost = read ('classpath:karate/request/reponsePost.json') ... passed Given path 'posts' ........................................................ passed And request requestBody ................................................... passed When method post .......................................................... passed Then status 201 ........................................................... passed And match response == responsePost ........................................ passed And assert response.title == requestBody.title ............................ passed And assert response.body == requestBody.body .............................. passed And assert response.userId == requestBody.userId .......................... passed
